====== Index template ======


===== About =====
An ''index'' [[docs:theme:template:template|template]] is the default template for the [[:docs:page:system:index|index pages]].


===== Layout =====

<grid>
<box>
Because [[:docs:page:system:index|index pages]] are landing pages for a [[:docs:page:system:namespace|namespace]], this template applies a layout that creates a sort of landing page layout.

This layout is composed of the following [[:docs:theme:slot:slot|slots]]:
  * [[:docs:theme:slot:header_slot|page header]]
  * [[:docs:theme:slot:footer_slot|page footer]]
  * [[:docs:theme:slot:side_slot|sidebar]]

</box>
